solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int magicalString(int n) {--newline--        if (n <= 0) return 0;--newline--        if (n <= 3) return 1;--newline--        --newline--        int[] a = new int[n + 1];--newline--        a[0] = 1; a[1] = 2; a[2] = 2;--newline--        int head = 2, tail = 3, num = 1, result = 1;--newline--        --newline--        while (tail < n) {--newline--            for (int i = 0; i < a[head]; i++) {--newline--                a[tail] = num;--newline--                if (num == 1 && tail < n) result++;--newline--                tail++;--newline--            }--newline--            num = num ^ 3;--newline--            head++;--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return result;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
